meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joe Ornstein Debby Mittelman Jack Lechner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #982.

td.p: Joe Ornstein, a proofreader from Brooklyn, New York
Debby Mittelman, a law student from Scottsdale, Arizona
Jack Lechner, a freelance writer originally from Arlington, Virginia (whose 4-day cash winnings total $33,300)

tr.td: WORD ORIGINS
SCIENCE
GAMES
INTERNATIONAL SHOPPING
PEOPLE
POTPOURRI
